title: Game On: The Hottest Upcoming Gaming Token Airdrops
description: UPDATED: Gaming airdrops are heating up, with Nifty Island, Nyan Heroes, and Apeiron revealing plans after the buzzy XAI token launch.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

Grayscale has seen the assets held by its Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) fall by roughly $5 billion over the past week. Meanwhile, a crypto trader made $6.77 million during the SatoshiVM (SAVM) token launch, and a Bitcoin mining firm’s share prices took a sharp dive on the same day it rang the Nasdaq’s opening bell, and a damning report posted accusations against the firm. 

Grayscale has seen the value of its Bitcoin ETF decline sharply over the past week due to a combination of share redemptions and adverse market conditions.

Between Jan. 10 and Jan. 18, assets under management held by the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) have fallen from $28.5 billion to $23.7 billion, according to data from YChart and GrayScale.

Read more

title: Bitcoin ETFs Eclipse Silver, Claiming Second Spot Behind Gold in U.S. ETF Market
description: Spot bitcoin ETFs, after a phenomenal market debut, have claimed the second-largest commodity position in the U.S. ETF market, growing larger than silver and trailing only behind gold, in a clear sign of the the mainstream appetite for the digital asset. Bitcoin ETFs Outshine Silver, Secure Second Place in U.S. ETF Commodities Spot bitcoin exchange-traded […]

title: Former FTX clients file objections against proposed bankruptcy payouts
description: The ongoing bankruptcy proceedings of the cryptocurrency exchange FTX have hit a contentious phase as former customers voice strong objections to the proposed reimbursement plan. According to sources, these customers are petitioning Judge John Dorsey to reject the exchange’s methodology for calculating the value of their crypto assets. The crux of the disagreement lies in […]

title: Elon Musk’s X seemingly opens dedicated payments page
description: An “X Payments” account was seen on the social media platform on Jan. 19 as Elon Musk’s company continues to bag money transmitter licenses across the United States.

title: SEC acknowledges Nasdaq’s spot Bitcoin ETF options request
description: Options trading for spot Bitcoin ETFs may be up after a Securities and Exchange Commission nod allowed multiple “non-security commodity” funds to list on U.S. exchanges.

title: Saga increases airdrop incentives for games on crypto platforms
description: Saga, a layer-1 blockchain network, announced a play-to-airdrop crypto campaign in partnership with games on leading blockchain networks.
